title: Ep. #76 | Catching Up: Eric of THE BOYZ
description:
This week, we've got TWO Erics in the house! Eric from The Boyz shares how he went from aspiring baseball player to aspiring K-pop star, how he passed his first audition (thanks to "company lady"), and why he doesn't set goals anymore.


Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.


Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios


Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !


SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios


#EricSohn #손영재 #THEBOYZ #더보이즈 #CHASE #THE_STEALER #EricNam #에릭남 #Kpop #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios
